'''Audism''' is a term used to describe discrimination against [[Deaf]] or [[hard of hearing]] people, for example by assuming that the cultural ways of hearing people are somehow better or the only way things can be. Compare with [[sexism]], [[racism]], [[sizeism]], [[heteronormative]], [[transphobia]], [[homophobia]], etc.
